reviewText:
Guro Keating obviously has a deep knowledge as well as a very high skills in weaponry. YET! his explanation is simply easy to follow as step-by-step building blocks that are easy to combine and blend.

As a result, any practitioner, regardless of style, even weapon-based like me as a long time Silat practitioner; would benefit TREMENDOUSLY from these DVDs.

They are simply highly recommended for any practitioner seeking for good self-defense against knife attacks.
James Keating has a great knowledge of blade combat. The information in this DVD is well worth the price.
This DVD is incredibly informative and well put together.  James Keating is a wealth of knowledge.  I strongly recommend this and any other DVD put out by Mr. Keating.
James Keating is an amazing master at arms and I have enjoyed learning from his techniques. Adding another great DVD to my Keating collection.
